channel.title: Pendant Light on Loja do Daniel
channel.description: Recent content in Pendant Light on Loja do Daniel

item.title: Void Pendant
item.description: Inspired by vacuum flasks, Void is made from glass which is formed into a complex double-walled shade. A small but powerful bulb deep inside the lamp creates a soft but directional light beam, while the exterior is polished to a highly reflective finish in Pendant and Surface light versions.

item.title: Retro Vintage Industrial Cage Pendant System
item.description: Rustic look comes with industrial chic and luxe finish.This steampunk pendant system is made of four wrought iron cage painted black and are complimented well with the classic Edison filament Bulb. 100 YEARS AGO INDUSTRIAL WAS THE NORM, NOW IT IS A NOSTALGIC STYLE REMINISCING THE PAST. Size: L-85 x W-10 x H-102cms Light fitting: E27/E26 x 4 Material: Black iron metal + Brass aluminium lamp holders
